data.title: Gauhati University B.Ed Entrance Result 2024 Direct Link, Check Merit List @ Onlinegu.in
data.meta_description: For quick access, here is the direct link to check the Gauhati University B.Ed Entrance Result 2024: Gauhati University B.Ed Entrance Result
data.text:
Gauhati University B.Ed Entrance Result 2024: Gauhati University is a prestigious institution in Assam, known for its quality education and comprehensive academic programs. The B.Ed Entrance Exam is a significant step for candidates aspiring to pursue a Bachelor of Education (B.Ed) degree at Gauhati University. This guide provides detailed information on how to check the Gauhati University B.Ed Entrance Result 2024, access the direct link to the result, understand the merit list, and answers to frequently asked questions.

Gauhati University B.Ed Entrance Result 2024

The Gauhati University (GU) has conducted the GU B.Ed Entrance Test 2024 for admission into the two-year B.Ed course. The exam was held on 14 July 2024 in an offline mode. Candidates who appeared for this entrance test can now check their results, which were released on 31 July 2024.

The result announcement includes the GUBEDCET Rank List, which is available in a PDF format. Candidates can access the rank list through the official website, onlinegu.in. This rank list will provide detailed information on the candidates’ scores and rankings.

Following the release of the merit list, the counselling process will begin. Candidates are advised to keep an eye on the official website for updates regarding the counselling dates and further instructions on the admission process.

This entrance test and subsequent processes are crucial for candidates aspiring to pursue the B.Ed course at Gauhati University, ensuring they follow the necessary steps to secure their admission based on their performance in the entrance test.

Gauhati University B.Ed Entrance Result 2024 Overview

Important Dates

B.Ed Entrance Exam Date: June 2024

Result Declaration Date: July 2024

Counseling and Admission Process: July-August 2024

How to Check Gauhati University B.Ed Entrance Result 2024

To check your Gauhati University B.Ed Entrance Result 2024, follow these steps:

Visit the Official Website: Go to the official Gauhati University website (http://www.gauhati.ac.in).

Navigate to the Results Section: Click on the ‘Examinations’ or ‘Admissions’ tab and select ‘Results’ from the dropdown menu.

Select B.Ed Entrance Exam Result 2024: Find the link for the B.Ed Entrance Exam Result 2024.

Enter Your Details: Enter your roll number or registration ID as required.

View and Download Result: Your result will be displayed on the screen. Download and print the result for future reference.

Direct Link to Gauhati University B.Ed Entrance Result 2024

For quick access, here is the direct link to check the Gauhati University B.Ed Entrance Result 2024: Gauhati University B.Ed Entrance Result 2024

Understanding the Merit List

The merit list for the Gauhati University B.Ed Entrance Exam 2024 will include the following details:

Candidate’s Name

Roll Number

Marks Obtained

Rank

Category

Status (Qualified/Not Qualified)

Steps to Follow After the Merit List is Released

Check Your Rank: Verify your name and rank in the merit list.

Attend Counseling: If your name appears in the merit list, attend the counseling session as per the schedule.

Document Verification: Bring all necessary documents for verification during the counseling session.

Pay the Admission Fee: Complete the admission process by paying the required fee to secure your seat.

Required Documents for Counseling

Original and photocopies of academic certificates and mark sheets

Identity proof (Aadhaar card, voter ID, etc.)

Passport-sized photographs

Category certificate (if applicable)

Counseling call letter

List of B.Ed College under Gauhati University

GU Afiliated Private B.Ed College

Frequently Asked Questions
